member.name: D3D10_EFFECT_TYPE_DESC.TypeName
member.summary: A string that contains the variable name.

member.name: D3D10_EFFECT_TYPE_DESC.Elements
member.summary: The number of elements if the variable is an array; otherwise 0.

member.name: D3D10_EFFECT_TYPE_DESC.Members
member.summary: The number of members if the variable is a structure; otherwise 0.

member.name: D3D10_EFFECT_TYPE_DESC.Rows
member.summary: The number of rows if the variable is a matrix; otherwise 0.

member.name: D3D10_EFFECT_TYPE_DESC.Columns
member.summary: The number of columns if the variable is a matrix; otherwise 0.

member.name: D3D10_EFFECT_TYPE_DESC.PackedSize
member.summary: The number of bytes that the variable consumes when it is packed tightly by the compiler.

member.name: D3D10_EFFECT_TYPE_DESC.UnpackedSize
member.summary: The number of bytes that the variable consumes before it is packed by the compiler.

member.name: D3D10_EFFECT_TYPE_DESC.Stride
member.summary: The number of bytes between elements.
